testimonials.headline: Real St. Johns Moving Stories
testimonials.subheadline: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what your neighbors in St. Johns are saying about their experience with T&E Movers.

reviews.testimonialText: We had a fantastic experience with T&E Movers for our move to Durbin Crossing. The team was punctual, professional, and took great care of our belongings. They made the whole process seamless and stress-free.

I was very impressed with T&E Movers. They were on time, efficient, and the final price was exactly what they quoted. The crew was friendly and hardworking. I would highly recommend them to anyone moving in St. Johns.

Moving into our new home in RiverTown was a breeze thanks to T&E. They were careful with our furniture, and the crew was fantastic. A truly 5-star service that I would recommend to all my new neighbors.

faq.headline: St. Johns Moving Questions, Answered
faq.subheadline: As St. Johns' local moving experts for over 25 years, we have the answers to all your questions about moving in our thriving community.

items.question: How much does a local move in St. Johns cost?
items.answer: Our local moves start at just $397. The final cost depends on the size of your home and any extra services. We provide transparent, price-lock guarantees with no hidden fees.

items.question: Are you familiar with the HOAs in St. Johns communities?
items.answer: Yes, we are very experienced with the rules and regulations of HOAs in communities like Julington Creek, Durbin Crossing, and RiverTown, ensuring a smooth moving day.

items.question: How far in advance should I book my move?
items.answer: We suggest booking 3-4 weeks in advance. St. Johns is a high-demand area, especially during school breaks and summer, and our schedule fills up quickly.

items.question: What areas do you serve around St. Johns?
items.answer: We serve all of St. Johns, including Fruit Cove, Julington Creek, and Durbin Crossing. We also handle moves to and from neighboring communities like Nocatee and Ponte Vedra.

items.question: Do you offer packing services for large homes?
items.answer: Yes, our full-service packing is ideal for large family homes in St. Johns. Our professional team can efficiently pack your entire house, ensuring everything is protected.

items.question: Can you handle moves with difficult access?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our teams are trained to handle various situations. Please let us know about any potential access challenges when you book your move so we can plan accordingly.

movingTips.headline: Top Tips for a Smooth St. Johns Move
movingTips.subheadline: After 25 years of moving families in St. Johns County, we know how to make your relocation a success. Here are our top tips.

tips.title: Check Your HOA Rules
tips.description: Many St. Johns communities have specific rules for moving day. Check with your HOA for approved hours and parking, and share the details with us.

tips.title: Hire True Local Movers
tips.description: Choose a licensed and insured moving company that knows St. Johns. We understand the traffic patterns and community layouts to save you time and hassle.

tips.title: Declutter Before Packing
tips.description: Get rid of unwanted items to reduce your load and save money. St. Johns has many great donation centers.

tips.title: Label for Your New Home
tips.description: Label boxes by room and contents. This makes unpacking at your new St. Johns home much faster and helps our crew place items correctly.

tips.title: Use Quality Materials
tips.description: Florida's humidity can weaken cheap boxes. We provide professional packing services and premium materials to protect your belongings.

tips.title: Protect Your Valuables
tips.description: Keep important documents, jewelry, and irreplaceable items with you during the move. Don't pack them in the moving truck.

tips.title: Schedule Utilities Early
tips.description: Arrange for utilities in St. Johns to be transferred or started before moving day. You'll want that AC on and ready!

tips.title: Pack an Essentials Kit
tips.description: Pack a 'first night' box with snacks, toiletries, chargers, and a change of clothes that travels with you, not on the truck.

tips.title: Communicate With Us
tips.description: Let your T&E moving coordinator know about specialty items, access issues, or time restrictions. Clear communication is key!

tips.title: Relax & Enjoy Your New Home
tips.description: You're moving to a fantastic community! Let our experienced team handle the heavy lifting so you can start enjoying your new home.

cta.headline: Ready for a Stress-Free St. Johns Move?
cta.subheadline: Let our experienced team handle everything while you focus on the excitement of your new home. Get your free quote today!
